task: Develop a basic 'Street Fighter II' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Accept advice'.
name: Street Counsel

branding_data.short_description: Street Counsel is a reimagined fighting game inspired by 'Street Fighter II', where players must accept advice from mentors to succeed.
branding_data.detailed_description: Street Counsel takes the classic fighting game mechanics of 'Street Fighter II' and adds a unique twist: players must accept and utilize advice from various mentors to enhance their skills and strategies. Each character in the game is guided by a mentor who provides strategic tips and advice before and during battles. Players must adapt to these suggestions to outsmart their opponents and progress through the game. The game features a diverse roster of fighters, each with their own backstory and mentor, creating a rich narrative experience alongside the intense combat.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
